description: Etou Fujiko is the current head of the Etou family, the leader of the girls` dormitory at Constan Magical Academy, and also the leader of a secret society of students who use black magic for evil purposes. She is one of the few who are aware of Sai Akuto`s situation, and plans to use Akuto`s demon lord powers for her own ends. Despite her plans to manipulate Akuto for her own ends, she is romantically attracted to him.
name: Etou Fujiko
